comments: wants students to understand the material. clear explanations. fair exams. very energetic.
VERY VERY HELPFUL PROF. I love her, she is the best, especially for foreign student. Teach from her heard, she wants every student get whatever she is teaching. Top recommented professor!!

Very easy proffessor. Young energetic and really cares about her students and wants them to do well. Plus she gives tons of extra credit. Her Tests r all multiple choice and very easy and she gives reviews before each test. Well worth it to take If your intersted in a very easy and interesting class
She\'s great. Very helpful, very clear, and take the time out to explain if you dont understand something. No hw, just optional practice quizzes. Attendance isnt mandatory. Very fair grader.

The most greatest professor of ALL TIME!!!!! She is simply amazing. No HW, gives extra credit quizzes for every class. She talks really clear and the class is interesting and if I say something is interesting it REALLY is. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!! You won\'t regret it I tell you that! :D

The class is very interesting and fun ..try to do research study early on in semester..read the textbook from page to page..and if you can\'t read a chapter in the book..try looking at the helpful power point and looking up key terms..i hardly came to class and still did very well, but I read the text book thoroughly and took the chapter quizes

Fair, not too easy not too hard. Four exams which were multiple choice on about 3-4 chapters. Attendance not mandatory, i went to class about once per month and still got an A+, just read the text book and do the review sheet.

she is an amazing teacher.gives 18 extra points for quizzes from the book. posts powerpoints on blackboard so its not that important to attend class. but gives excellent lectures and if you regularly attend class you\'ll do good. But if you choose to read from the book only you score around a B. I just 4 absences and got an A+ in her subject.

Young, grad student. Knows what she\'s talking about. Fun class. No HW, gives extra credit quizzes almost every class (only 5 questions). Textbook helps reinforce what she\'s saying, plus the answers to the quizzes are in it (sometimes the quizzes due has topics not yet discussed in class). 4 exams on a few chapters, gives a study guide.
Reallly Good professor, attendance not mandatory, 4 multiple choice exams on about 3-4 chapters. extra credit quiz available, just do the review sheet and you will be fine.

3 all multiple choice tests, she makes the material very easy to understand and remember with all her fun stories. She gives a lot of opportunities for extra credit and she makes the class very interesting.
